Method Detail

trimRight

public static String trimRight(String rawData)
Returns a string with no trailing whitespace. If the input is null, returns null. If the input has trailing whitespace, returns the appropriate substring. If the input has no trailing whitespace the input is returned;

Parameters:
rawData -
Returns:

attributeName

public static String attributeName(String columnName)
Converts a sql object name to a java identifier. The identifier is formed by stripping all "_" characters and converting all characters following an "_" to upper case.

attributeNameInitCap

public static String attributeNameInitCap(String name)

attributeNameUpper

public static String attributeNameUpper(String columnName)
Converts a sql object name to a java identifier with the initial character upper case. The identifier is formed by uppercasing the first character, stripping all "_" characters and converting all characters following an "_" to upper case.

compare

public static final boolean compare(String s1,
                                    String s2)
Returns:
true if both strings are null or they are equal (letter case ignored); false otherwise.

cooked

public static String cooked(String raw,
                            String escapingCharacters,
                            String escapeString)
Provides a 'cooked' StringBuffer for a canonical StringBuffer by prefixing any escapingCharacters in the raw String with the escapeString

Parameters:
raw -
escapingCharacters - a string of characters that require escaping
escapeString - The string that should precede any characters that require escaping.
Returns:
The cooked version of the string.
